$description: Challenge theming tokens. Creators select one color palette and one accent font. Each color has 3 tones: background (light), emphasis (mid), and text (dark). All emphasis colors are muted to align with the Motiv brand palette (warm, calm, emotionally mature).

colors.$description: Each palette has exactly 3 tones for consistent, accessible theming. Emphasis colors target 35–42% saturation to stay within brand bounds.

violet.name: Violet
violet.description: Calming, spiritual, creative. Great for yoga, meditation, and mindfulness challenges.

background.description: Warm light violet for backgrounds, cards, and large surfaces.

emphasis.description: Dusty violet for buttons, progress bars, badges, and interactive elements.

text.description: Deep muted violet for text on light backgrounds.

rose.name: Rose
rose.description: Warm, nurturing, feminine. Perfect for self-care, wellness, and beauty challenges.

emphasis.description: Dusty rose for accents and interactive elements.

emphasis.description: Muted terracotta for energy and action.

emphasis.description: Muted ochre for warmth and positivity.

emphasis.description: Muted sage-green for freshness and vitality.

typography.$description: 7 curated fonts for challenge titles. Mix of sans-serif and serif, all highly readable and professional.

source-serif-4.description: Warm and editorial with refined serifs. The Motiv default—trustworthy, mature, and inviting.

allOtherText.note: Only the challenge title uses the accent font for consistency

application.$description: How colors are applied in challenge screens.

celebration.$description: Win/loss screens always use the dark celebration background from app tokens.

presets.$description: Pre-made theme combinations for quick creator setup.

colorContrast.textOnBackground: All text colors meet WCAG AA (4.5:1) on their background
colorContrast.textOnEmphasis: onEmphasis color meets WCAG AA on emphasis color
colorContrast.automated: System enforces, no creator override needed
